text:
I have a number of tasks that Ant would be very usefull for.  Unfortunately I 
can see no way to generate a list of files based upon the age of the file.

For instance, maybe I would want to archive all the files that are seven days 
old or greater.
creator: afriedl@data-source.com
levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
most tasks having to do with files in ant are done based on filesets.
filesets may be defined with a selector in them.
One of these selectors is based on date.
http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTypes/selectors.html
this example is the kind of things you want to do :
<fileset dir="${jar.path}" includes="**/*.jar">
    <date datetime="01/01/2001 12:00 AM" when="before"/>
</fileset>
So I close this bug rep as works for me.
